function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High percentage of participants afraid to go to common places to avoid infection","Impact":"Potential spread of disease due to fear of going to common places","Mitigation":"Increased public education on effective preventive measures and regular disinfection of common places","Technologies":"Use of public health communication strategies and advanced disinfection technologies","People":"Participants and general public","Owner":"Government health departments and local authorities"},{"Description":"Disagreement on whether corona patients can be treated at home","Impact":"Potential for incorrect or unsafe treatment of COVID-19 patients at home","Mitigation":"Clear communication of treatment protocols and provision of remote monitoring and support for home-based care","Technologies":"Remote monitoring technology and telemedicine","People":"COVID-19 patients and their caregivers","Owner":"Healthcare providers and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Participants in certain demographics showing lower attitude scores","Impact":"Potential for reduced adherence to preventive measures and healthcare recommendations","Mitigation":"Tailored public health interventions for specific demographics and targeted outreach to improve attitudes","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying at-risk demographics and targeted health communication strategies","People":"Participants in low-scoring demographics","Owner":"Public health organizations and community outreach programs"}]}
